author: in
Alexander, Christopher: Notes on the Synthesis of Form

author: tag
Alexander, Christopher: deduktion + rhetorik + voraussetzung + serie + ankommen + form + logik + determiniert + betonung + legitim + sinn + vorschreiben

author: quote
Alexander, Christopher: It is not possible to set up premises, trace through a series of deductions, and arrive at a form which is logically determined by the premises, unless the premises already have the seeds of a particular plastic emphasis built into them. There is no legitimate sense in which deductive logic can prescribe physical form for us.
